name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specifically in the development of robust solutions using **C++**, **Qt**, and **Linux** environments. Demonstrated proficiency in leveraging **DBus** for inter-process communication and utilizing **OpenTelemetry** for observability in microservices. Proven track record in project management and leading teams, showcasing strong collaboration and teamwork skills.

Additionally skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with extensive hands-on experience in frontend and backend development through frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
